description: Borrowed from Latin desertor (“deserter”), from desero (“I forsake, I abandon”); or from desert +‎ -er.

definitionGroups.group: (military) A person who has physically removed him- or herself from the control or direction of a military or naval unit with the intention of permanently leaving

entries.meaning: Under the United States Code of Military Justice, a person who has been placed on AWOL status for more than 30 days
